alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Mercer (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT MERCER AND NORTHWESTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 925 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kinsman to near Lordstown. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hermitage, Sharon, Sharpsville, Greenville, Farrell, New Wilmington, Mercer, Pulaski, Stoneboro, New Bedford, West Middlesex, Sandy Lake, Clark, Wheatland, Jamestown, Fredonia, Jackson Center, New Lebanon, Volant, and Sheakleyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 115 and 137. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 20. Interstate 376 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
